description: This is the schema definition for the Firmware Version.  It is used as part of other schema.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent the version of firmware for a Redfish implementation.

VersionString.description: This string represents the version of the firmware image.
VersionString.specification: This property shall represent the manufacturer version of the firmware image.

FWVersion.description: This object contains information about the version of a firmware image.
